channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- CM Email Registration Blacklist and Whitelist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- CM Email Registration Blacklist and Whitelist

item.title: CVE-2024-5167|2024-07-13T06:00:09.955Z -- unknown -- cm%20email%20registration%20blacklist%20and%20whitelist
item.description: The CM Email Registration Blacklist and Whitelist WordPress plugin before 1.4.9 does not have CSRF check when adding or deleting an item from the blacklist or whitelist, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin add or delete settings from the blacklist or whitelist menu via a CSRF attack
